name: DischargeServicesObservationCare
title: Discharge Services Observation Care
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Under Development),(Data Element Scope: Under Development),(Inclusion Criteria: Under Development),(Exclusion Criteria: Under Development)

concept.display: Observation care discharge day management (This code is to be utilized to report all services provided to a patient on discharge from "observation status" if the discharge is on other than the initial date of "observation status." To report services to a patient designated as "observation status" or "inpatient status" and discharged on the same date, use the codes for Observation or Inpatient Care Services [including Admission and Discharge Services, 99234-99236 as appropriate.])
